name: Samurai Duel (Defrog, Helvest)
description:
Samurai Duel

This game was create for the ludum Dare 50. Celebrating 20 years now

It is a dialogue/fight between two samurais. The father who is the leader of an empire and his son who is the leader of an army. However, his son tries to delay the inevitable by attempting a dialogue…

THEME

Delay the inevitable.

Controls

[E] for attack
[Up / Down] Selection choice for narative purpose.

Credits

Programming and Game Design: Helvest & Defrog

Art: Coma Harmonium

Music: Ted (from open game art)

Fonts: "Coming Soon" & "Permanent Marker" (from google font)
